channel.title: Program
channel.description:
Hello,
Is there a program for servers that runs, auto-restarts, and antilags?? If you know of one, please give me a thread or download link. Thanks.
-maxxy

item.title: Program
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

There is no programs to run you server, it can only run in a batch file, and anti-null is server-sided, the only program i know of that restarts your server is voule, and a few others. Look in your source for voule.

Read full topic
